updates.content: Due to the ongoing threats and vandalism, Metrofibre have made the difficult decision to suspend repairs in this area until further notice. This decision has been made to prioritise the safety of their employees and contractors, who have been facing violent threats and safety concerns. Metrofibre is continuing to monitor the situation and will resume repairs in the area as soon as it is safe to do so.
